mean_cn: v. 虚张声势，吓唬；  n. 虚张声势；  adj. 直率的
mean_en: to try to make somebody believe that you will do something that you do not really intend to do, or that you know something that you do not really know
sentence: He is bluffing and ready to run away from the battle.
sentence_trans: 他在虚张声势，准备从这场群架中逃走。
